Love this skirt! I’m a transportation engineer so I needed this for work! I was worried because they only had a size bigger than my usual size but it actually fits perfectly. Great one

Super happy with this skirt! The material is a nice stiff fabric that holds its shape so no clinging! I ordered a 3x but I definitely could have sized down to a 2x (which is my normal size but I was worried about it being tight). There are buttons on the side that allow you to tighten it a little bit which is helpful with that. And pockets! You can’t go wrong with this skirt. Super cute, good quality for the price, and it’s exactly what I was hoping it would be.

This skirt seems like it will look nice and fit well after a wash and iron, if you got the correct size. The stitches look like they will hold up to a lot of washing. The item description differs just a little in that the skirt is actually 95% cotton, not 97%.  I bought the large based on the size chart but even on the tighter button, it was too loose for my liking. I would prefer a snug waist for A-line skirts. The buttons should be the same or similar shade as the skirt instead of transparent. I feel like transparent buttons are more easily seen and I would want to hide them with my top instead of wearing my top inside of the skirt. It was easy to zip and the cloth is thick/heavy, so I don't see the need for lining.  Overall, it's a lovely skirt and I may update my review if I get a medium instead.
This skirt is wonderful. It's comfortable. Very pretty colors. I may be ordering more in different colors. Easy care, washer and dryer. Sizing is spot on.u
Loved that it has two buttons, and is elastic, so it sits on the waist; my only complaint is that it came with a hole in the right pocket.
The hem is only 1/4". This causes it to roll and not lay smooth. I had to sew 1/2" ribbon around the whole bottom edge to stop this from happening. Still gets points because it has pockets.
The skirt looked as pictured, but the material was scratchy and stiff. It did not seem comfortable.

I'm so happy with this purchase!  It fits true to size.  I'm 5'3 and it falls right below my knee.  What I didn't expect was how stiff and structured the skirt is.  The pleating is really nice and it holds its shape so well!  There's pockets! and the pattern is beautiful.  It definitely holds up to some of my higher end pieces.  In the picture, the bottom looks scalloped but it is a regular straight hem.  Not a deal breaker for me but not as pictured.  This skirt is perfect for work or a semi dressy event

评论概述: Cute but not a great fit
评论详情: I love the pattern of the skirt and have had my eye on it for a while. The pattern drew me and I was finally able to buy it. However I must say that while I am a little disappointed that the skirt came wrinkly, that can be fixed. What I deducted stars for was the fit. I am small at around 5ft and just over 100 pounds  so I knew I was taking a chance with this skirt since I knew it ran long but it comes well below my knees and fell to my hips. If I pull the skirt up and hold it tight in the back it looks better but bunches. I am annoyed they didn’t have a smaller size but I suppose I knew the risk I was taking when I ordered and will just have to alter it. The skirt is not amazing quality but did not seem shear, picked, or stained on arrival either. All this being said you get what you buy and with this you’re buying an average mass produced skirt in a cute pattern. I personally think this product is about ten dollars over priced, but I did buy didn’t I?

评论概述: Misleading Stock Photo, awful cheap skirt
评论详情: NOT A FAN. DON’T waste your money on this skirt. Bad fit, puckered waistline, teeny pockets, awful cheap dull fabric. Read on.  Sizing: order nearly three sizes up, the sizing labels are way off. Runs EXTREMELY small. Even then, it won’t be an accurate fit.  Fabric: not shiny as pictured. It’s a dull cotton/spandex blend. The fabric picks up lint like CRAZY. It also wrinkles immediately. It basically is very cheap, and not lined. It will drive you crazy.  Waistband: not smooth as pictured. The waistband looks like a hair scrunchie- it’s puckered and unflattering. Also, has a brown button closure on a black skirt? SMH.  Bottom line- this skirt will make you look 15 pounds heavier than you are. If that’s what you want- have at it.  I’m so sick and tired of misleading photos and horrendous cheap clothing straight from China (sorry but true) on Amazon. Amazon is just like every other online site now. AWFUL.

Runs large. Size guide said i should order a 2X; 1X or X would have been better fit. Button and belt allows for acceptable fit. I got the bold blue/white check pattern. Great colors. Bold. Cute retro look with white tee and keds.
I was pleasantly pleased with this skirt I will say I should have ordered a 2X instead of a 3X but that’s no one’s fault but mine. I will continue to order from the store.
The skirt had a hole in it right out of the packaging. Unfortunately, I did not discover the whole until after my 30-day rerun window had passed.
I used it for various occasions.

Listing says cotton/polyester, but the skirt is actually polyester double knit, not the poplin cotton that appears in the photos.  Label says 95% polyester/5% spandex.  Irritating to have to find a UPS store to send it back when the item description is false.
